org.modelio.api.modelio.diagram

Interface IDiagramDrawingNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDiagramDrawing, IDiagramGraphic, IDiagramNode

    public interface IDiagramDrawingNode
extends IDiagramDrawing, IDiagramNode
    Diagram drawings are diagram graphics that are by nature not related to a model elements.

    Diagram drawings nodes have an associated label.

    Since:
    3.8

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.modelio.api.modelio.diagram.IDiagramNode
